gwt.canvas.client
Class CanvasPixelArray

java.lang.Object
  gwt.canvas.client.CanvasPixelArray

public class CanvasPixelArray
extends java.lang.Object

Interface that provides ordered, indexed access to the color components of each pixel of the image data. The data is represented in left-to-right order, row by row top to bottom, starting with the top left, with each pixel's red, green, blue, and alpha components being given in that order for each pixel.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

getData

public byte getData(int index)
Gets the pixel color value at the given index.

Parameters:
index - 0 based index. index 0 to 3 represents the R, G, B, A values of the top left pixel, and index 4 to 7 represents the color values of the next pixel to the right of the top left pixel.
Returns:
the color value at the given index.

setData

public void setData(int index,
                    int data)
Sets the pixel color value at the given index.

Parameters:
index - 0 based index. index 0 to 3 represents the R, G, B, A values of the top left pixel, and index 4 to 7 represents the color values of the next pixel to the right of the top left pixel.
data - the color value at the given index.
